input_text:
Job Title: Manufacturing Operator

Location: Reedsburg, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
POSITION TITLE: Manufacturing Operator - 3rd Shift

REPORTS TO: Manufacturing Supervisor

LOCATION: Reedsburg, WI

HOURS: 3rd Shift: 11:00 PM – 7:00 AM plus a shift premium of $1.00 for second and third shifts.

POSITION SUMMARY: Inspect parts, monitor processes, assemble, and package various plastic components.

Primary Responsibilities

Adhere to and comply with all written GMP/Safety policies and procedures.Perform changeover duties as required. Complete required Total Productive Maintenance (TPM) tasks as assigned. Accurately complete required reporting; including data entry.Fill and empty boxes, totes, gaylords, and stack them by hand on pallets.Monitor part quality, machine performance rates and complete required production reporting documentation.Perform routine quality checks utilizing visual quality standards as assigned.General Pad Printing machine operation, including controls, safety switches, restarts, shutdowns, mixing/adding/cleaning of inks, and assist with tool changes.Participate in PEAK initiatives as directed.Keep a clean work area, machines/equipment and sustain 6S principles.Perform other duties as assigned.All job functions to be completed in compliance with federal, state, local regulations, company guidelines and policies.

_

Requirements / Education Level

High School diploma or equivalent is preferred.Communicate effectively both written and verbal. Complete and pass required medical screening.

Knowledge, Skills, And Ability

Basic math and readingBasic computer skillsProcedure comprehensionAbility to adapt to changing manufacturing priorities, including overtime schedules.Ability to achieve and consistently perform at required manufacturing rates.Ability to work independently and within a team environment.

Physical Requirements

Ability to stand up to 90% of the shift.Lifting up to 30 pounds Must be able to frequently bend and twist and have unrestricted use of upper extremities.Push/Pull up to 200 pounds of force

Newell Brands (NASDAQ: NWL) is a leading global consumer goods company with a strong portfolio of well-known brands, including Rubbermaid, Sharpie, Graco, Coleman, Rubbermaid Commercial Products, Yankee Candle, Paper Mate, FoodSaver, Dymo, EXPO, Elmer’s, Oster, NUK, Spontex and Campingaz. We are focused on delighting consumers by lighting up everyday moments. Newell Brands and its subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity Employers and comply with applicable employment laws. EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Manufacturing Operator
output_json.summary:
Position Title: Manufacturing Operator - 3rd Shift
REPORTS TO: Manufacturing Supervisor
LOCATION: Reedsburg, WI
HOURS: 3rd Shift: 11:00 PM – 7:00 AM plus a shift premium of $1.00 for second and third shifts.
job_responsibilities: Adhere to and comply with all written GMP/Safety policies and procedures.
Complete required Total Productive Maintenance (TPM) tasks as assigned.
Accurately complete required reporting; including data entry.
Fill and empty boxes, totes, gaylords, and stack them by hand on pallets.
Monitor part quality, machine performance rates and complete required production reporting documentation.
Perform routine quality checks utilizing visual quality standards as assigned.
General Pad Printing machine operation, including controls, safety switches, restarts, shutdowns, mixing/adding/cleaning of inks, and assist with tool changes.
Participate in PEAK initiatives as directed.
Keep a clean work area, machines/equipment and sustain 6S principles.

We are focused on delighting consumers by lighting up everyday moments. Newell Brands and its subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity Employers and comply with applicable employment laws. EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.
